ComicInfo.Summary:
In the (probably) last Asterix and Obelix-album by Albert Uderzo, there isn`t a big adventure. In this one, Asterix and Obelix spend their birthday. Naturally, it`s not a traditional one at that...
Has reprinted material. None of it has been printed in the series before, though.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-01-20 14:38:09. [Issue ID 209937]
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/asterix-34-asterix-and-obelixs-birthday-the-golden/4000-209937/
